{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=F@ST 2704 |revision=R |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=VW3FAST2704R |fcc_date=09/08/2012 |ic_id=9140A-FAST2704R |flags=ADSL2+ |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63281 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1_brand=Winbond |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |stock_boot=CFE;7.113;; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=etdm }} "ZA63281W-97AA V1.0" and "2012-02-08" appears to be silkscreened on the board.
This device ''appears'' to use a 2 stream Broadcom wireless chip.
US ID: NS3DL01BFAST2704R
